[vaex.dataframe.accessor]
astro = vaex.astro.transformations:DataFrameAccessorAstro

[vaex.dataset.opener]
fits = vaex.astro.fits:FitsBinTable
gadget = vaex.astro.gadget:MemoryMappedGadget
tap = vaex.astro.tap:DatasetTap
votable = vaex.astro.votable:VOTable

[vaex.plugin]
astro = vaex.astro.legacy:add_plugin
